title: ImaGhee â€” Image Converter
blurb: Local, fast image conversion: PNG, JPEG, WebP, AVIF (where supported). Batch, resize, quality, and metadata stripping by default.
description: ImaGhee is a local-first image converter that runs entirely in your browser using canvas codecs. Convert to PNG/JPEG/WebP/AVIF, adjust quality, resize with max dimensions, preserve or flatten transparency (choose a background for JPEG), and download results. No server round-trips; images never leave your device.
